text: Jesús Castillo Rangel (24 October 1896 - 20 December 2017), also known as Don Chuchito, was a Mexican revolutionary leader. He was born in Chiapas, Mexico. At the time of his death, he was the oldest living person in Mexico. His age and date of birth is verified by the Archivo General de la Nación. He fought in the Mexican Revolution in Quintana Roo. Rangel died at the alleged age of 121 on 20 December 2017 in Quintana Roo, Mexico of respiratory failure.Muere el hombre más longevo de México a los 121 años == Related pages == * Oldest people == References== Category:1896 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Mexican military people Category:Supercentenarians Category:People from Chiapas Category:People from Quintana Roo
title: Jesús Castillo Rangel
